original_title: The Incidental Insurgents: The Part About the Bandits (Chapter 2)
overview: The Incidental Insurgents is meant as an investigation into the possibilities for the future rather then the past, where a convoluted story situated in multiple times starts to emerge. Initiating an obsessive search to figure out how we, like the incidental figures before us, find ourselves inhabiting a moment full of radical potential and disillusionment. Searching for what we cannot yet see but feel is possible.
title: The Incidental Insurgents: The Part About the Bandits (Chapter 2)
